basics.name: Nicholas Lazzerini
basics.label: Web Frontend Developer | Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: Hi, I'm Nicholas (aka Nick). I am a tech enthusiast who loves to develop and create interesting and fun stuff (mainly just to "try something out"). When I'm not coding I spend my time out in nature taking photos. I am a volunteer firefighter as well as a registered blood and organ donor.

work.summary: Working for the customers team of yoox.com website. My main role is to add new features and maintain features that are already in place on the site
As a CTO, my role is to speak with customers as well as be sure we provide the best possible result.

work.position: Web Developer | UI/UX Designer | Graphic Designer
work.summary: My job was to develop the app that allows the customers to control their heating systems from their internet-connected devices. I also developed the company websites and some graphical assets

I worked on a project which involved the creation of a webpage that needed to be compatibile with all versions of ie6 and above. The page was showing a detailed explanation of a product line with description for each part of it
My job was to create and maintain the company's website as well as create some graphic assets used in a slot machine game

work.position: Web Developer | Graphic Designer | IT Technician
work.summary: My Main occupation involved the development of websites, creation of graphic assets and PC built and maintenance
I worked on several different projects as a freelancer for different clients around the world.

publications.name: Genius Lite - Chrome Extension
publications.summary: I created the official Genius Hub chrome extension. This extension let you control your heating system while browsing the web

publications.name: Genius Hub App
publications.summary: This app allows you to control your heating system over the internet from wherever in the world you are. This is the main part of the Genius product

publications.name: Dracula Chrome Theme
publications.summary: I created the official Dracula theme for Google Chrome
